Name: ECO - Eurocode Core Ontology
Short Description: The Eurocode Core Ontology (ECO) provides a formal semantic representation of foundational concepts from the Eurocodes, the European standards for structural design. It enables machine-readable interpretation of regulatory knowledge, supporting automated reasoning, semantic interoperability, and integration with engineering workflows. ECO is designed as a modular, extensible framework for use in intelligent, standards-compliant design tools within the AECO industry. [https://doi.org/10.1016/j.aei.2025.104218](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.aei.2025.104218)
Linked-to ontologies UPPER: owl; rdf; xml; xsd; rdfs; skos;
